attributes.title: Donald trump is an absolutely terrible human being.
attributes.review:
how does a bastard, racist, sexist and more
become president?
well to be honest I’m not really sure.
he shouldn’t have won back in 2016
but for some reason he still won over the votes of the
straight white homophobic white supremacists.
intelligence? neither he or his supporters got any.
elegance? nah. this orange bowling ball don’t got any.
supporting all lives matter like a racist enemy.
deleting tik tok, the entertainment lots of people use? 
yeah, sure go ahead. chinese spyware. besides, who cares about the youths?
but reforming the police? no no no.
it’s fun with them being racist and beating black people so.
if you vote for trump, you don’t care about america.
either you’re ignorant or racist voting for such an unfit bum.
for garbage presidents, yeah, we had plenty
but let’s hope to god that trump loses 2020!

attributes.title: Hate it!!!!!!!🧚‍♀️🧚‍♂️🧚
attributes.review: Hate this app!! Every time I opened my phone there would be a picture of a trash can as my home and lock screen and I can’t change it back. And the time on my phone is stuck to 4:20 and my battery percentage is stuck at 69%. And that’s not even the worst of it. Apparently this app hacks into your home security system and computers and listens to you and can change almost everything about them. So every other day I’m locked out of my house.

attributes.title: Invasion of privacy!!!
attributes.review: I bought this app because I love Trump, but this app is a huge invasion of my privacy! It kept asking me for my phone number, which I hesitantly gave. Then it asked for a whole bunch of information about my family and then even asked for my credit card information and security number!!!!! I gave it because I trust our president, but all of my money went missing and my mom hasn’t been seen in days. Please, if you love your family, don’t get this app!!!

attributes.title: disappointment of an app
attributes.review: this app made me diarrhea for weeks... i would not recommend this app to anyone who doesn’t like there you know what being on fire... it was like taco bell XD... also i would not recommend looking at the merchandise because when i did it made my eyes feel like they were in fire and my eyesight has been terrible scince i went to the eye doctor yesterday and they told me due to the hideous things i saw i am legally blind and will never be able to regain my eyesight ever again

attributes.title: Do not download
attributes.review: I downloaded it will full intent to get EDUCATED but all I got was furry p0rn. Yes that is right. I saw two people dressed as wolves just going at it. I opened it up in front of my CHILDREN. Now they are FURRIES THEMSELVES. One of them wants me to call her star, the inter dimensional pan romantic kiwi bird. I DONT EVEN KNOW WHAT THAT MEANS. For some reason my camera roll is filled with the awful stuff now, and sadly I think my husband saw. Now he wants to try this weird roleplay in the bedroom, but we are CHRISTIANS. We only have sex to make children, otherwise it is DISGUSTING. DO NOT DOWNLOAD

I got this app to try and show my support for our president and I couldn’t even do anything on it. It glitches so bad I can’t even be in the app for more than a Minute without the app completely shutting down, that is just no acceptable. Second of all the software is SO SLOW it took me 4 weeks to download this app and it doesn’t even work right that is NOT ok. This app should be taken down immediately because an app this bad has no right being in out app stores.

attributes.title: Game poo poo
attributes.review: You can do be like that sometimes I think I have to the point where is the god of the queen and the god of the queen and I wanna was a good night and a good day to come over for the night I was so late I was so sorry to be late but you forgot your phone so you don’t know how much you have been so busy and you know what I mean and you don’t know how much you have been so much better I don’t have any good night I don’t want you I wanna is your way you don’t have come over for a little bit

attributes.title: The app doesn’t work at all😡🤬
attributes.review: When I got in the app it would glitch then it also has a lot of bugs I downloaded this app to learn about our president but the app doesn’t work at all 0/10 don’t recommend it doesn’t let you do anything on the app and sometimes my phone screen would turn orange and I thought it was my phone so it turned it off completely then turned it back on and it got worse so I don’t recommend you using this app at all.

attributes.title: MY EYEBALLS 😭😭
attributes.review: I downloaded the app to learn about our wonderful president Mr. Orange. But when i clicked into the app, I WAS GREETED WITH A HUMAN HOLDING HIS HAND UP!!! 😱😱😱. My whole life has been a lie 😔😔😔😔. Well it wasn’t all that bad. It would be weird to have an orange as a president. But the craziest part was that I was using my scissors to cut out a beautiful statue of our president, and.. and.... and... when I saw trumps bootiful face, my scissors yeeted out of my hands and stabbed my eyes!!!!!!!! How dare my scissors do that!!!!!!!!!!!!!! I was going to make the statue and feed it to my dumpster friend behind Walmart 😞

attributes.title: Delete this app
attributes.review: I absolutely hate this app ever since I used it my phone start to lag and glitch I know it was this app because I have never seen my phone do this and it’s been fine all day until I used this app it also put a weird photo on my screen that I rather not say because it was very very weird for the children then I had got a alert this made me upset because now I have to pay lots of money to get my phone fixed because this app
